_header: Alone I live alone / And sore I sigh for one
Note:
For these lines used as burden, cf. 636 and 3701; cf. also 451; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 138.
_description: A burden (only) of a love song — one couplet, with music by Dr. Cooper
